availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Monroe Pool (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky native. Married Jane Hix Pool in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 12, 1844. Father of Frances M. Pool, Sarah J. Pool, T. B. Pool, and J. T. Pool. Married to Mary Stephens Pool. Father of E. A. Pool. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Employed William Childress as a farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Resident in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Second District, p. 365A.
